quote: It is a thing of no great difficulty to raise objections against another man's oration, it is a very easy matter; but to produce a better in it's place is a work extremely troublesome.
quote_letters: IT IS A THING OF NO GREAT DIFFICULTY TO RAISE OBJECTIONS AGAINST ANOTHER MANS ORATION IT IS A VERY EASY MATTER BUT TO PRODUCE A BETTER IN ITS PLACE IS A WORK EXTREMELY TROUBLESOME
